channel.title: People on SIPEG — Shafqat Institute for Pakistan & Emerging Geopolitics
channel.description: Recent content in People on SIPEG — Shafqat Institute for Pakistan & Emerging Geopolitics

item.title: Professor Dr. Saeed Shafqat
item.description: Leads SIPEG’s strategic direction across research, advisory, and stakeholder engagement, focusing on Pakistan’s evolving role in a changing world.

item.title: Dr. Mariam Saeed Shafqat
item.description: Advises on education, curriculum, and national capacity building aligned with Pakistan’s strategic needs.

item.title: Raza Shahid
item.description: Connects SIPEG research with stakeholders through outreach and communications.

item.title: Dr. Tayyeb Shabbir
item.description: Advises on finance, risk, and governance, connecting macro trends to board-level decision-making.

item.title: Dr. Ahsan Rana
item.description: Advises on public policy design, institutional reform, and state capacity, linking research evidence to governance practice.

item.title: Dr. Paul Rollier
item.description: Provides anthropological insight on culture, identity, and societal change in Pakistan and the region.

item.title: Dr. Matthew McCartney
item.description: Guides SIPEG on economic development, industrial policy, and the regional impact of global economic shifts.

item.title: Ali Jaffer Zaidi
item.description: Offers strategic perspectives, historical framing, and narrative thinking for SIPEG’s research and outreach.

item.title: Jean-Luc Racine
item.description: Advises on South Asia–Europe relations, regional connectivity, and comparative geopolitical perspectives.

item.title: Dr. Rabia Chaudhry
item.description: Leads research on governance, policy design, and the societal impacts of geopolitical change.

item.title: Ayesha Siddique
item.description: Conducts applied research across political economy and regional policy questions.

item.title: Haseeb
item.description: Supports data collection, analysis, and publication workflows across SIPEG projects.

item.title: Ali Jan Qadir
item.description: Supports outreach and storytelling to broaden the impact of SIPEG’s research and events.
